select sga.id,sga.code,sga.score,sga.evaluation_date,sga.evaluation_reason,sg.title as goods_name, sc2.name as category_level_two,sc1.name as category_level_one,ur.name as create_name,ur.tel as create_tel from shop_goods_appointment as sga,shop_goods as sg,shop_category as sc2,shop_category as sc1,user_resident as ur
sga.goods_id = sg.id and sg.category_id = sc2.id and sc2.parent_id = sc1.id and sga.create_id = ur.id and sga.score is not null
and sga.score BETWEEN 1 and 4
and sga.score BETWEEN 5 and 6
and sga.score BETWEEN 7 and 10
and ur.tel like concat('%',#{tel},'%')
